product_description: Oversized navigators with ultrathin metal frames are finely detailed with tortoiseshell-effect lacquer and gadrooning at the browline and hinges.
product_details_and_care:
Oversized navigators with ultrathin metal frames are finely detailed with tortoiseshell-effect lacquer and gadrooning at the browline and hinges.
64mm lens width; 14mm bridge width; 145mm temple length
100% UV protection
Adjustable nonslip nose pads
Nylon lenses
Metal
Made in Italy
Item #6008812
